quotes.quote: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Faith is a cop-out. If the only way you can accept an assertion is by faith, then you are conceding that it can�t be taken on its own merits.
quotes.author: Dan Barker

quotes.quote: I always admired atheists. I think it takes a lot of faith.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: If you can't have faith in what is held up to you for faith, you must find things to believe in yourself, for a life without faith in something is too narrow a space to live.
quotes.author: George E. Woodberry

quotes.quote: Treat the other man's faith gently; it is all he has to believe with. His mind was created for his own thoughts, not yours or mine.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: And so faith is closing your eyes and following the breath of your soul down to the bottom of life, where existence and nonexistence have merged into irrelevance. All that matters is the little part you play in the vast drama.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: God, I don�t have great faith, but I can be faithful. My belief in you may be seasonal, but my faithfulness will not. I will follow in the way of Christ. I will act as though my life and the lives of others matter. I will love. I have no greater gift to offer than my life. Take it.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: The universe seems wondrous to me, with or without God. It has powerful lines and uncompromising ways. Patience and time sit like sages on the planets, strong and impersonal. There is a stark beauty to all of this.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: We think having faith means being convinced God exists in the same way we are convinced a chair exists. People who cannot be completely convinced of God�s existence think faith is impossible for them. Not so. People who doubt can have great faith because faith is something you do, not something you think. In fact, the greater your doubt the more heroic your faith.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: What I am actually saying is that we need to be willing to let our intuition guide us, and then be willing to follow that guidance directly and fearlessly.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: To believe in God or in a guiding force because someone tells you to is the height of stupidity. We are given senses to receive our information within. With our own eyes we see, and with our own skin we feel. With our intelligence, it is intended that we understand. But each person must puzzle it out for himself or herself.
quotes.author: Sophy Burnham

quotes.quote: Faith is, at one and the same time, absolutely necessary and altogether impossible.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: Whatever God's dream about man may be, it seems certain it cannot come true unless man cooperates.
quotes.author: Stella Terrill Mann

quotes.quote: If you think you can win, you can win. Faith is necessary to victory.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: He wears his faith but as the fashion of his hat.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gets you an education.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner
